citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45pm on
November 8, 2023. The APHIS official knocked on the door and was informed that the licensee was not presently at the
facility and was not expected to be for several hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:45pm on 
November 8, 2023. The APHIS official knocked on the door and was informed that the licensee was not presently at the 
facility and was not expected to be for several hours. 
 
 
End Section
